item.title: Learning Note: Computer Graphic - basic structure and OpenFrameworks
item.description: 圖學筆記 - 基本名詞與openFramework結構 credit: Mastering Openframeworks (e-BOOK) 任何影像形成須包含兩種基本實體:物件(object) & 觀察者(也是相機擺放位置, camera)
